metadata.title: CVE-2020-17487 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: radare2 4.5.0 misparses signature information in PE files, causing asegmentation fault in r_x509_parse_algorithmidentifier in libr/util/x509.c.This is due to a malformed object identifier inIMAGE_DIRECTORY_ENTRY_SECURITY.

criterions.comment: radare2 package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
